A

add method puts the new value in the next memory entry.

address field stores the address of the memory entry.

The core of our assembler

a variable which is set when debug argument is passed through terminal.
dump() - Method in class Memory
dump method merges all the entris in one signle String to be written to output file, in addition it inserts zero values to adjust the addresses in word sizes.

K

kernel.RegValues - Class in <Unnamed>
RegValues is a inner class for storing values and name of constants and registers used for initializing registers in vanilla core.
